summary: The package offers a Python-based framework for programmatic video and audio editing. It defines core abstractions for media segments, a hierarchy for visual and audio effects, configuration utilities to locate and invoke external processing tools like ffmpeg, and a set of helper functions for common tasks such as time conversion, file handling, and subprocess management.
business_intent: Enable developers and content creators to automate the production, manipulation, and rendering of multimedia projects, reducing reliance on manual editing tools and streamlining workflows for video generation, postâ€‘production, and dynamic content creation.
